channel.title: Help with removing thread per client
channel.description:
well i was following the tut and when i got up to the finding
[code] private java.io.InputStream in; private java.io.OutputStream out;[/code]
was where i got messed up.
I searched my client.java, my server.java and all the IO.java files for this. where is this supposed to be?

item.title: Help with removing thread per client
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

should i add it, and if i should where do i add it?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2009, 06:34:57 pm[/size][hr]actually i just searched for java and i found it, i dont know why it doesnt show up when i search for private java.io.InputStream in;

Read full topic
